com.kevalpatel2106.emoticongifkeyboard.internal.emoticon

Class EmoticonGridAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • com.kevalpatel2106.emoticongifkeyboard.internal.emoticon.EmoticonGridAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Adapter, ListAdapter, SpinnerAdapter

    final class EmoticonGridAdapter
extends BaseAdapter
    Created by Keval on 01-Sep-17. An adapter to bind the Emoticon list with the grid view.
    Author:
    Kevalpatel2106

private final Context mContext

      • mEmoticonProvider

        @Nullable
private final EmoticonProvider mEmoticonProvider
        EmoticonProvider to provide the custom icon. If the this field is null system emoticon icons will render.
